meaningMnemonic: You know how 文句 is a <vocabulary>complaint</vocabulary>, right? Well, add する to make it a verb and you have <vocabulary>to complain</vocabulary>. This is a really casual way to complain though, usually used in manga or on social media. Keep your eye out for it!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
